info.title: Read a partially checked checkbox in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('[role="checkbox"]').focus();

user: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state.
instructions.raw: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the checkbox (partially checked) is conveyed
